title: The Mice of Riddle Place
description: An educational game I developed with Meadowlark Science and Education. It took place in a world of anthropomorphic mice, where the player was tasked with solving the mystery of why Mrs. Wirth was getting sick, by using environmental observation and scientific deduction. The main gameplay was composed of first person exploration and puzzle solving, with the occasional mini-games to demonstrate various parts of the scientific process. I focused my time with Meadowlark on the game design of both the core game loop, and a few of the mini-games. I also helped implement the systems for various minigames, and graphic designed / animated 2d art.
